title: DOC: Invalid Signal Handling
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/05-agents.md (Signal Protocol) and docs/07-execution.md.

## Problem
No documentation on handling malformed or invalid signals from agents.
Example: "<axiom>COMPLET</axiom>" (typo) or "<axiom>UNKNOWN_TYPE</axiom>"

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document signal validation rules
- [ ] Define fallback behavior for invalid signals (treat as no signal?)
- [ ] Add signal validation regex/parser spec
- [ ] Document error logging for invalid signals
- [ ] Add to 15-errors.md

## Files
- docs/05-agents.md
- docs/07-execution.md
- docs/15-errors.md

title: DOC: Uncommitted Changes Warning
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/02-modes.md and docs/09-intervention.md.

## Problem
No documentation on behavior when working directory has uncommitted changes at startup.

## Questions to Answer
- Should AXIOM warn about uncommitted changes?
- Should it refuse to start?
- Should it auto-stash?

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document uncommitted changes handling policy
- [ ] Add warning message to 02-modes.md Init flow
- [ ] Consider adding to config: `init.allowDirtyWorkdir`

## Files
- docs/02-modes.md
- docs/01-configuration.md

title: DOC: Checkpoint Rotation Policy
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/09-intervention.md (Checkpoint System).

## Problem
No documented limit on checkpoint count. Could fill disk over time.
No retention/rotation policy.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document checkpoint retention policy
- [ ] Add config: `checkpoints.maxCount`, `checkpoints.maxAgeDays`
- [ ] Document automatic cleanup of old checkpoints
- [ ] Add manual cleanup command/UI option

## Files
- docs/09-intervention.md
- docs/01-configuration.md

title: DOC: Empty Verification Array Behavior
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/01-configuration.md and docs/07-execution.md.

## Problem
No documentation on behavior when config.verification is empty array.
Does COMPLETE signal auto-pass? Is this a valid config?

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document empty verification behavior (auto-pass on COMPLETE)
- [ ] Add validation warning for empty verification
- [ ] Consider: require at least one verification command?
- [ ] Update 01-configuration.md with note

- docs/07-execution.md

title: DOC: Incremental Planning + Autopilot Interaction
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/03-planning.md (Incremental Planning) and docs/02-modes.md (Autopilot).

## Problem
Unclear how incremental planning interacts with autopilot mode. Does it pause autopilot? Require user interaction?

## Questions to Answer
- Does incremental planning trigger pause autopilot?
- Can planning happen in background while agents work?
- What if user is AFK during incremental planning trigger?

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document incremental planning in autopilot context
- [ ] Clarify user interaction requirements
- [ ] Add config option: `planning.autopilotBehavior: pause|background|skip`
- [ ] Update both 03-planning.md and 02-modes.md

## Files
- docs/03-planning.md
- docs/02-modes.md
- docs/01-configuration.md

title: DOC: Corrupted Event Log Recovery
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/09-intervention.md (Crash Recovery, Event Replay).

## Problem
Event replay is fallback when snapshot invalid, but what if events.jsonl
is also corrupted (truncated during crash)?

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document event log validation
- [ ] Document partial replay recovery (replay valid prefix)
- [ ] Document fallback when both snapshot and events corrupted
- [ ] Consider: periodic event log checksum/backup

## Files
- docs/09-intervention.md
- docs/15-errors.md

title: DOC: Init Mode Prerequisites Check
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/02-modes.md (Init Mode section) and docs/01-configuration.md.

- [ ] Document minimum disk space requirement
- [ ] Add prerequisite check flowchart to 02-modes.md
- [ ] Update 15-errors.md with prerequisite error codes

title: DOC: Plan Rejection Flow
description:

Before starting, review docs/03-planning.md (5-Phase Dialogue) thoroughly.

- [ ] Add rejection options (restart, modify, partial approve)
- [ ] Document case cleanup on rejection
- [ ] Add to Axel's behavior description

title: DOC: Verification Command Timeout

Before starting, review docs/07-execution.md (Verification Gate) and docs/01-configuration.md.

- [ ] Document behavior on verification timeout (fail? skip? retry?)

title: DOC: Human Escalation Timeout
description:
## Context
Before starting, review docs/06-integration.md (Complex conflicts) and docs/11-review.md.

## Problem
When conflict escalates to human and human is unavailable (e.g., overnight),
task waits indefinitely. No timeout or fallback documented.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Document escalation timeout config
- [ ] Define fallback: skip task, defer, auto-retry later
- [ ] Add notification options (email, webhook)
- [ ] Update 06-integration.md Complex conflict section

- docs/06-integration.md
- docs/01-configuration.md
- docs/12-hooks.md (on-escalation hook?)

description:
